author: costin
msg: Generate solaris packages in tar.Z format instead of .zip

author: costin
msg: - moved back to init in main.xml - needed for Tstamp ( substitution
happens at object creation time, properties and tstamp needs to
be executed before ). Stefano, please don't kill me, I'll not use init
in other places, and I'll look for a solution for next release.
- removed old build scripts. Now all building is done in ant.

author: costin
msg: Removed init sections, added explicit dependency on prepare to all
targets ( needed because they use <dstamp> and it can't be executed

author: costin
msg: - moved "package" tag - main.xml will know where to put files,
